channel.title: Whonix 8 Release Date?
channel.description:
I tried Whonix 7.7.8.6 already and love it. Until now I used Whonix 5 because the stable debian is much better.
Is there a release date or month for the Whonix 8 start? The plan is to take Whonix 7.7.8.6 and release it as Whonix 8 after testing, right?
Edited by Patrick: Changed topic title.

item.title: Whonix 8 Release Date?

item.description:
Seems like there are no issues with 7.7.9.8… Preparing the release…

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 8 Release Date?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Is there a release date or month for the Whonix 8 start?
No.
The plan is to take Whonix 7.7.8.6 and release it as Whonix 8 after testing, right?
A few build script fixes and minor improvements have been made. If it goes well, soon rebuild as Whonix 8. New test. Then release.

Read full topic
